column1: Smoque BBQ////I'm a sucker for brisket (fatty
column2: please) so I got the plate with mac & cheese and cornbread and my bf got the pulled pork plate with baked beans and cornbread (bty
column3: it automatically comes with coleslaw). Now
column4: I've had my fair share of brisket and I had a local New Orleans favorite that unfortunately closed due to a family illness but Smoque BBQ ranks right up there with my local favorite. I will say this
column6: I know good mac & cheese and cornbread when I taste it
column7: and theirs is pretty darn good. We each were given 2 different sauces with our plate and we both preferred the tomato based sauce over the vinegar based sauce.
